Name: Coronation
About the game: Coronation is developed by Twin Sword Studio with the help of lovely Patreons and a closely-knitted Discord community. It is inspired by Mount & Blade Bannerlord, Rust, Sims 3/4, Runescape, Anno 1404 and Tropico 6. Multiplayer open-world Find a good location in the world to establish your lovely castle home in the harsh world with or without friends, or even make new friends and complete main story quests. Decorate and furnish your interiors There is a wide variety of functional furniture that you can decorate your interiors, and your people can use some of the furniture too! Your own personal workforce and army As the head of the castle, you can manage the jobs that your people do for you! Gather resources required to build your castle, or make lots of money with other jobs. Villagers can also level up and become stronger. Defend your castle or attack enemies You'll need to protect your people and property. There will be enemies every night depending on your location. Train a formidable army and equip them with powerful weapons! Visit other players' creations Since it's a multiplayer game, you can visit and explore the world for beautiful creations built by other players, or build your own and ask others to visit you at your castle.
Meta Title: Coronation: Oct 1, 2021, Twin Sword Studio and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Coronation? Check out the release date (Oct 1, 2021), developer insights from Twin Sword Studio, and a complete game summary.
